name: Intro to Computer Science
description: Introduction to the fundamentals of computer science. Topics include problem solving, computer systems, algorithms, and programming.

name: Introduction to Human-Computer Interaction
description: Overview of human-computer interaction, user-centered design, and the evaluation of interactive systems. Topics include human capabilities, interaction styles, user-centered design, and usability evaluation.

name: Intermediate Human-Computer Interaction
description: Advanced topics in human-computer interaction. Topics include user interface design, user interface technologies, and user-centered design for interactive systems.

name: Advanced Human-Computer Interaction
description: Advanced topics in human-computer interaction. Topics include user interface design, user interface technologies, and user-centered design for interactive systems.
